Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 165th overall pick, by Houston in 2009...
Traded from Houston to New York (N) on 6/16/2009 (Going to NYN: P A. Fuensanta, 2B S. Gennett, P Z. Von Rosenberg, SS D. Bell, SS R. Durham. Going to HOU: 3B D. Lamb, SS A. Gonzalez)...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 7/18/2010 (Going to PIT: P Z. Stewart, P A. Fuensanta. Going to NYN: 2B D. DeShields Jr)...
Had first career hit on 5/3/2016, off Guy Swift (CIN)...
Earned first career win on 5/19/2016...
Injured on 9/4/2016 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 10 weeks...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Cincinnati on 4/14/2020 (Going to CIN: P A. Fuensanta. Going to PIT: SS E. Caudillo, C J. Roche Jr., 3B R. Ruiz, SS R. Kress Jr.)...
